statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT last_name, email FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE age < 25 AND email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY customer_id
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%yahoo.com%'
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name,last_name,email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, age, email FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 2 ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, o.order_date, o.total_amount FROM customers c INNER JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE o.total_amount > 100 ORDER BY o.total_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(age) AS max_age FROM customers GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC, age ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, age, address FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age ASC;

SELECT c.name, o.product_name, s.sale_amount FROM customers c INNER JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id INNER JOIN sales s ON o.order_id = s.order_id WHERE c.age < 40 AND s.sale_amount > 100 ORDER BY s.sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT c.name AS customer_name, SUM(s.sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM customers c INNER JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id INNER JOIN sales s ON o.order_id = s.order_id GROUP BY c.customer_id HAVING total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT o.product_name, COUNT(s.sale_id) AS total_sales_count FROM orders o INNER JOIN sales s ON o.order_id = s.order_id GROUP BY o.product_name ORDER BY total_sales_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers_demographic_data;
SELECT customer_id, name, age, gender FROM customers_demographic_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Purchase';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers_demographic_data ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT name, age, email FROM customers_demographic_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers_demographic_data WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT product_name, total_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, source, campaign_name FROM marketing_data WHERE source='Online' ORDER BY campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT email, phone FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, gender FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, email, phone FROM customers WHERE age < 25 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY first_name DESC;
